sentence.Network_en: Infectious diseases are spreading among many of the flood victims.
sentence.Network_cn: 传染病正在遭受洪灾的很多灾民中蔓延。

sentence.Network_en: She radiates an infectious enthusiasm for everything she does.
sentence.Network_cn: 她做任何事情都充满一种极富感染力的热情。

list.exp: 传染性单核细胞增多症
list.abs: 传染性单核细胞增多症（infectious mononucleosis）是一种急性的单核-巨噬细胞系统增生性疾病，病程常具自限性。临床上表现为不 …

entry.def: A disease that is infectious can be caught by being near a person who has it.

example.tran: 类似麻疹这样的传染病

example.ex: These viruses affect children and are highly infectious.
example.tran: 这些病毒会侵袭儿童，而且具有很强的传染性。

entry.def: If a feeling is infectious, it spreads to other people.

example.ex: She radiates an infectious enthusiasm for everything she does...
example.tran: 她做任何事情都充满一种极富感染力的热情。

example.ex: There was a peal of laughter down the phone, which Harry found infectious.
example.tran: 电话里传来一阵响亮的笑声,哈里也不禁受其感染。

means.word_mean: 1. caused by infection or capable of causing infection;

sentences.sentence: "a carrier remains infective without himself showing signs of the disease"
"fear is exceedlingly infectious; children catch it from their elders"- Bertrand Russell

auth_sentence.content: The study appears in the Journal of Infectious Diseases.
auth_sentence.res_content: The study appears in the Journal of Infectious Diseases.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The study appears in the Journal of Infectious Diseases.

auth_sentence.content: His naturally infectious personality touched everyone who knew him.
auth_sentence.res_content: His naturally infectious personality touched everyone who knew him.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His naturally infectious personality touched everyone who knew him.

auth_sentence.content: Eagleman's excitement about his research is usually infectious.
auth_sentence.res_content: Eagleman's excitement about his research is usually infectious.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Eagleman's excitement about his research is usually infectious.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 受到影响的,不自然的,假装的
stems_affixes.word_buile: affect[v.影响;[疾病]侵袭;感动 n.情感,感情]+ed……的→被影响的
affection[n.爱,喜爱;爱慕之情;感情;疾病,不适]+ate……的→adj.挚爱的,充满感情的
affect情感+ive……的→adj.情感的,表达感情的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有效的,生效的;被实施的;给人深刻印象
stems_affixes.word_buile: effect[n.结果;效果;影响;印象 v.招致;实现;达到]+ive……的→adj.有效的,生效的;被实施的;给人深刻印象

stems_affixes.value_cn: 传染的,传染性的,有感染力的
stems_affixes.word_buile: infect传染+ious……的→adj.传染的,传染性的,有感染力的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 完善的;完全的;[语法]完成的
stems_affixes.word_buile: per全部+fect做,制作→全部做完→完善的
disaffect[v.使不满意,使疏远]+ed……的→adj.[政治上]不满的,叛离的
af使+fect做,制作→使……做→影响

stems_affixes.value_cn: 爱,喜爱;爱慕之情;感情;疾病,不适
stems_affixes.word_buile: affect[v.影响;[疾病]侵袭;感动 n.情感,感情]+ion表名词→n.爱,喜爱;爱慕之情;感情;疾病,不适
con共同+fect做,制作→很多[果子,甜品]加在一起做→调制[出糖果]
confect[v.调制,n.西点,糖果]+ion某种物→n.甜食,糖果

stems_affixes.value_cn: 糖果制造人, 糖果店
stems_affixes.word_buile: confection[n.甜食,糖果]+ery场所→n.糖果制造人, 糖果店
de坏+fect做,制作→做坏了→缺陷
de坏+fect做+ion表名词→做坏事
affect感动+ation表名词→做出的感动→做作
ef出+fect做,制作→做出来→出效果
infect[v.传染,感染;影响[思想等]]+ion状态→n.感染,传染;传染病
perfect[adj.完善的;完全的;[语法]完成的 v.使完美]+ion表名词→n.尽善尽美,完美
af使+fect做,制作→使……做→影响
con共同+fect做,制作→很多[果子,甜品]加在一起做→调制[出糖果]
dis分开+affect感情→感情分开→疏远
ef出+fect做,制作→做出来→出效果
effect[n.结果;效果;影响;印象 v.招致;实现;达到]+u+ate表动词→v.实行,完成
in进入+fect做,制作→做进去→传染进去
per全部+fect做,制作→全部做完→完善的

Sentence.sentence: It in an uncommon infectious disease.
